track.name: Hello
comments: QUE MÚSICA L I N D A
"Relapse my fave Em album" holy shit are you slow

"My equilibrium is off, must be the Lithium. I don't need to buy any drugs, man, people give me 'em. It just becomes everyday extracurriculum. No reason in particular, it was strictly fun: a fifth of rum and two bottles of 151, fifty-one people asleep in my damn living room." An example of his amazing rhymeschemes. People just say "Oh he's saying gibberish about drugs", and don't see that he could be talking about absolutely NOTHING and have the most complex and clever multis and internal rhymes in his lines.

"My equilibrium is off, must be the Lithium. I don't need to buy any drugs, man, people give me 'em. It just becomes everyday extracurriculum. No reason in particular, it was strictly fun: a fifth of rum and two bottles of 151, fifty-one people asleep in my damn living room."
i love it how cats think em cares AT ALL about how much respect they have for him.  if you dont dig the style anymore, move on!!!  artists evolve, apparently your tastes dont.
@ xbluemystx: dude how is the eminem show shit? I can see where you are coming from about encore and relapse...but the eminem show is far from a piece of shit
Best one on Relpase for sure. The lyrics are pretty stupid, but his delivery, combined with the beat, is killer.
